resources.string: Quotify
Believe you can and you are halfway there.
The harder I work, the luckier I get.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Do not watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Do you want to save it?
Yes

saved it!

This quote is attributed to Theodore Roosevelt, highlighting the power of self-belief in achieving success.
This quote is attributed to Thomas Jefferson, emphasizing the correlation between hard work and increasing opportunities for success.
This quote attributed to Peter Drucker, emphasizing the importance of proactively shaping own future rather than passively waiting for it to unfold.
This quote inspires perseverance and action, emphasizing the need to stay focused and determined.
This quote is often attributed to Eleanor Roosevelt, emphasizing the significance of having faith in own dreams.
